title: Sickle
content:
Sickle Common 1~4 Damage 1d4 Slashing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A farming tool with a wicked edge, spilling blood and grain with equal ease. Sickle Light 0.9 10

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A farming tool with a wicked edge, spilling blood and grain with equal ease.

Sickle is one of the Simple Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to mas
